full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 34 of 262 1739
LC8VMAX2 Shawn - direct
1 THE COURT: All right. Ms. Gill, thank you. You're excused. You may step down.
2 (Witness excused)
3 THE COURT: The government may call its next witness.
4 MS. COMEY: The government calls Shawn.
5 THE COURT: The witness testifying under the name "Shawn" may come forward.
6 SHAWN,
7 called as a witness by the Government,
8 having been duly sworn, testified as follows:
9 THE COURT: You may be seated. Please remove your mask. This witness will be testifying under the name Shawn to protect the anonymity of a prior witness who I permitted to testify by her first name.
10 I do remind the sketch artists that the exact likeness of Shawn not be drawn, please, in order to protect the anonymity of the other witness.
11 Ms. Comey, you may inquire.
12 MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor.
13 May the witness remove his mask?
14 THE COURT: Oh, I'm sorry. Yes.
15 Shawn, please remove your mask.
16 DIRECT EXAMINATION
17 BY MS. COMEY:
18 Q. Good morning.
19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
20 DOJ-OGR-00013312

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
